text: Horsfieldia tenuifolia is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Borneo. ==References== * de Wilde, W.J.J.O. 1998. Horsfieldia tenuifolia. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Horsfieldia tenuifolia
